# Request for Information

## Title

Reinforcement and Replacement of Long-Range Radar Sites Fuel Storage Tanks

## Request Description

Defense Construction Canada (DCC) intends to issue a solicitation for consultant services to support the reinforcement and replacement of the fuel storage tanks at eight long-range radar sites in Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, and Newfoundland and Labrador.

## Description of the Project

The project involves the replacement of the existing fuel storage tanks with new double-walled tanks, including pre-design investigations, technical studies, and preparation of tender-ready packages for the decommissioning, demolition, and removal of the existing tanks.

## Security Requirements

To be eligible for contract award, consultant applicants must hold a valid and active Designated Organization Screening (DOS) granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) at the time of closing.

## Sponsorship Request Process

Defense Construction Canada is providing early access to the security clearance application process through sponsorship under its Industrial Security Program (ISP). Consultant applicants interested in participating in the solicitation must begin the security clearance application process by submitting a sponsorship request application to DCC following the steps identified on DCC's website.

* Contract Number: MPNWS007_ 78956
* Solicitation Number: MPNWS007_ 78956
* Tender Closing Date: December 9, 2024, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 20, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: December 20, 2024
* Region of Delivery: Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, and Newfoundland and Labrador
* Trade Agreements Applied: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open Tendering
